name: FolderPermissions
description: Extension to add permissions of given users to the folders.
helpMarkDown: This is to add permissions of given users to the folders.
author: mohdaslamansari

inputs.name: machinesList
inputs.label: Machines
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the machine IP address or FQDN.

inputs.name: AdminUserName
inputs.label: Admin Login
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the administrator's login of the target machine.

inputs.name: AdminPassword
inputs.label: Password
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Provide the administrator's password of the target machine.
The best practice is to create a variable in the Build or Release definition, and mark it as 'Secret' to secure it, and then use it here, like '$(adminPassword)'.

inputs.name: Path
inputs.label: Folder Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the names of folders where permissions needs to be added.

inputs.name: Users
inputs.label: Users
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the name of users who needs permissions to the given folders.

inputs.name: Control
inputs.label: Type of Rights
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the type of rights required for the users on the given folders.
